alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued November 27 at 3:33AM EST until November 27 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM EST THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (10.7 to 12.5 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Essex MA and Suffolk MA Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM EST this morning through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding is expected along the North Shore from Gloucester to Newburyport. Wave action will likely cause some washover onto coastal roads around the time of high tide. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Gloucester Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 15.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 27/01 PM 11.6/12.1 2.1/ 2.6 0.8/ 1.3 2 Minor 28/02 AM 9.9/10.4 0.4/ 0.9 0.8/ 1.3 3-4 None 28/02 PM 10.7/11.2 1.2/ 1.7 0.2/ 0.7 3 None 29/03 AM 9.2/ 9.7 -0.3/ 0.2 0.2/ 0.7 3 None 29/03 PM 10.1/10.6 0.6/ 1.1 0.1/ 0.6 2 None Merrimack River near Newburyport MA MLLW Categories - info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
